initial_question.title: 为什么sensevoice模型的输入是NXTX560？
initial_question.body: 很多asr的输入是NXTX80, sensevoice的560是什么含义

satisfaction_conditions: Input dimension calculation must be mathematically explained
Relationship between original frame size and final dimension must be clear
Frame combination technique must be specified
Technical terminology must be defined or explained

initial_question.title: MacBook Pro M1 按照说明编译报错
initial_question.body:
`/Users/soulmayon/desktop/ali/SenseVoice.cpp/sense-voice/csrc/sense-voice-decoder.cc:125:13: error: use of undeclared identifier 'ggml_backend_metal_set_n_cb'
            ggml_backend_metal_set_n_cb(backend, n_threads);
            ^
/Users/soulmayon/desktop/ali/SenseVoice.cpp/sense-voice/csrc/sense-voice.cc:120:25: warning: unused variable 'key' [-Wunused-variable]
            const char *key = gguf_get_key(gguf_ctx, i);
                        ^
/Users/soulmayon/desktop/ali/SenseVoice.cpp/sense-voice/csrc/sense-voice.cc:175:22: warning: unused variable 'scale' [-Wunused-variable]
        const size_t scale = sense_voice.hparams.ftype ? 1 : 2;
                     ^
/Users/soulmayon/desktop/ali/SenseVoice.cpp/sense-voice/csrc/sense-voice.cc:262:20: warning: variable 'buffer_size' set but not used [-Wunused-but-set-variable]
            size_t buffer_size = 32*1024; // need some extra room??
                   ^
/Users/soulmayon/desktop/ali/SenseVoice.cpp/sense-voice/csrc/sense-voice.cc:237:21: warning: unused variable 'hparams' [-Wunused-variable]
        const auto &hparams = sense_voice.hparams;
                    ^
/Users/soulmayon/desktop/ali/SenseVoice.cpp/sense-voice/csrc/sense-voice.cc:229:12: warning: unused variable 'ctx_size' [-Wunused-variable]
    size_t ctx_size = 0;
           ^
/Users/soulmayon/desktop/ali/SenseVoice.cpp/sense-voice/csrc/sense-voice.cc:231:21: warning: unused variable 'wtype' [-Wunused-variable]
    const ggml_type wtype = sctx.wtype;
                    ^
/Users/soulmayon/desktop/ali/SenseVoice.cpp/sense-voice/csrc/sense-voice.cc:232:21: warning: unused variable 'vtype' [-Wunused-variable]
    const ggml_type vtype =
                    ^
/Users/soulmayon/desktop/ali/SenseVoice.cpp/sense-voice/csrc/sense-voice-encoder.cc:113:9: error: use of undeclared identifier 'ggml_backend_metal_log_set_callback'
        ggml_backend_metal_log_set_callback(g_state.log_callback,
        ^
/Users/soulmayon/desktop/ali/SenseVoice.cpp/examples/common-ggml.cc:250:17: warning: variable 'nelements' set but not used [-Wunused-but-set-variable]
        int32_t nelements = 1;
                ^
/Users/soulmayon/desktop/ali/SenseVoice.cpp/examples/common-ggml.cc:336:21: warning: variable 'f32_data' is uninitialized when used here [-Wuninitialized]/Users/soulmayon/desktop/ali/SenseVoice.cpp/sense-voice/csrc/sense-voice-encoder.cc:
163:13: error:                     f32_data[i] = ggml_fp16_to_fp32(data_f16[i]);
use of undeclared identifier 'ggml_backend_metal_set_n_cb'                    ^~~~~~~~

            ggml_backend_metal_set_n_cb(backend, n_threads);
            ^
/Users/soulmayon/desktop/ali/SenseVoice.cpp/examples/common-ggml.cc:329:29: note: initialize the variable 'f32_data' to silence this warning
            float * f32_data;
                            ^
                             = nullptr
/Users/soulmayon/desktop/ali/SenseVoice.cpp/sense-voice/csrc/sense-voice-encoder.cc:458:17: warning: unused variable 'model' [-Wunused-variable]
    const auto &model = ctx.model;
                ^
/Users/soulmayon/desktop/ali/SenseVoice.cpp/sense-voice/csrc/sense-voice.cc:410:9: error: use of undeclared identifier 'ggml_backend_metal_log_set_callback'
        ggml_backend_metal_log_set_callback(g_state.log_callback, g_state.log_callback_user_data);
        ^
/Users/soulmayon/desktop/ali/SenseVoice.cpp/sense-voice/csrc/sense-voice.cc:763:19: warning: unused variable 'n_ctx' [-Wunused-variable]
        const int n_ctx = state->feature.n_len;
                  ^
`

satisfaction_conditions: Code compiles without GGML API-related errors
Code is compatible with current GGML API version
Remaining warnings do not affect functionality
